column4: if im running a duel boot system winxp/bunt 10-64 can i easily epunge  and swap for the 32-bit version or would thi be complicated .I knoe it will take some part and format  or what ever but when i go to install the other will it be a problem?
You can easily wipe out the old Ubuntu install. During the installation process, just reformat the ubuntu partition
What is the problem you are having?
You probably don't need to switch to the 32-bit version
